attributes.additional_details: The government need set up regulations for all counselling and psychotherapy. For counsellors themselves not having this regulation often means joining a governing body and being charged each year. It also means many counsellors are asked to work unpaid. After spending thousands of pounds on degree etc, I feel it is unfair to then ask us to work for no or very little money, even within the NHS.
attributes.background: Counselling and psychotherapy in the UK is unregulated, this means anyone can call themself a counsellor. People deserve to know their counsellor has the correct qualifications and skills to help. Not having these qualifications can cause harm.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/467141
